price: 9. Gyventi tenais. Tai Allaho Pažadas, kuris yra tiesa. Ir Jis yra Visa Galingas, Visa Išmintingas.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqan wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
